field.name: contrastColor
field.label: Enter contrast color code #
field.description: Enter the hex color code for contrast color (sidebar, links etc.)

field.name: readDirection
field.label: LTR or RTL text flow?
field.description: Display text from left ot right (LTR) or right to left (RTL) ?

field.name: fontAwesome
field.label: Enable Font Awesome Icons
field.description: Enable or disable Font Awesome icons. Disable it if you donÂ´t need the icons to save bandwidth.

field.name: stickyNav
field.label: Sticky Navbar
field.description: Should the navbar be fixed to the top

field.name: animatedElements
field.label: Load the animate.css file
field.description: Loads the animate.css file which provides nice CSS3 animations which can be easily attache dto a HTML element. Read more here: http://daneden.me/animate/.

field.name: showComponent
field.label: Show Main content area
field.description: Display main content area

field.name: basicLayout
field.label: Select the basic layout
field.description: Full Size = Template wrapper use full screen size, Boxed= Template wrapper surrounds the template body only

field.name: wrapperAlignment
field.label: Select the wrapper alignment
field.description: Should be the template body centered, left-, or right aligned?

field.name: responsiveBehavior
field.label: Select the layout behavior
field.description: FIXED = Template use one fixed size (max width entered below), RESPONSIVE = Template scale up and down between the min and max size setup below

field.name: maxWidth
field.label: Select max width in px
field.description: If the basic layout is set to fixed width or responsive you can define a max width in pixels here

field.name: minWidth
field.label: Select min width in px
field.description: If the basic layout is set to responsive you can define a min width in pixels here

field.name: sidebarWidth
field.label: Select sidebar width in px
field.description: If the basic layout is set to 'fixed with fixed sidebar' you can define width in pixels here for the sidebar

field.name: logoType
field.label: Select logo type
field.description: Should the template use a image, a text, the moduleposition 'logo' or a combination of an image and text as logo?

field.name: logoText
field.label: Enter logo text
field.description: Enter the logo text if logo type is set to 'text' or 'image and text'

field.name: logoFile
field.label: Upload logo image
field.description: Select a image from the Joomla internal media manager or upload your own one. If nothing is selected but the logo type is set to 'text' or 'image and text' the template use the 'sample_logo.png' file from its own '/img' folder

field.name: backgroundImagetype
field.label: Type of background image
field.description: Select if the template should use a full size background image or a texture

field.name: backgroundImage
field.label: Upload background image1
field.description: Select a image from the Joomla internal media manager or upload your own. It will be used as texture or full size image if a type is selected above. If nothing is selected but the background image option above is active the template use the 'sample_background.jpg' file from its own '/img' folder

field.name: note
field.label: If you select other images below too you will activate the full size background image slider automatically. Only than the Duration and Fading option takes effect.

field.name: backgroundImageduration
field.label: Duration per image
field.description: The time a background image appears before it fades out. Default is 8000

field.name: backgroundImagefade
field.label: Fading time
field.description: Time from one background image to another in ms. Default is 1000

field.name: backgroundImage2
field.label: Upload background image 2
field.description: Select a image from the Joomla internal media manager or upload your own.

field.label: Upload background image 3

field.name: sliderEffect
field.label: Type of slide effect
field.description: Choose the type of slide effect

field.name: sliderChange
field.label: Time from one slide to another
field.description: Enter the time between one slide to another in ms. Default is 1000

field.name: sliderAuto
field.label: Autoplay
field.description: Enables the autoplay function for the slider

field.name: sliderPagination
field.label: Show slider pagination
field.description: Show links with number to every slide

field.name: sliderArrows
field.label: Show slider Arrows
field.description: Show Prev and Next link to slide through

field.name: hoverPause
field.label: Stops on hover
field.description: The slideshow stops on mouseover. good for longer content or videos.

field.name: loopSlider
field.label: Loop Slider content?
field.description: If enabled the slider will restart from the beginning. If disabled slider will stop at the end

field.name: sliderTime
field.label: Time per slide
field.description: Time one slide appears in ms. Default is 8000

field.name: subTheme
field.label: Select a Sub Theme CSS file
field.description: This applies a extra style.css file from the selected subfolder of the sub themes directory. Can be used for development issues. You can add/remove certain styles and overwrite the default CSS with it without touching the original files.

field.name: loadMootools
field.label: Activate Mootools?
field.description: Older extension can require Mootools JS framework. In this case turn on this option?

field.name: loadInview
field.label: Load the inview.js script?
field.description: Loads the inview.js script. This detects if an element is inside or outside the users viewport. Combin it animation or transitions for cool effects. Deactivate if you donÂ´t need it to save bandwith and optimize the websites performance.
